sprint.teammembers: Charlotte, Christophe, Dominique, Jan, Jelle, Kevin, Pieter, Plamen, Rebekka, Tom

ul.li: Make a successfull MNR prototype 8 with larger coverage and extra content
Train other Maplines on CDP/MNR infrastructure

story.title: Automated setup of virtual machines to run TIF2TTOM and MNR conversions

slide.p: Virtual machine to run TIF2TTOM periodic build

ul.li: svn co http://svn.tomtomgroup.com/repos/productcreate/trunk/greenhouse/kde/vm_pb
vagrant up
download latest snapshot of a VM template (with preinstalled Oracle server, python, java, pcontrol daemon, hadoop client, ...)
download (stable) griddy and zonecreate tools from nexus
download (latest) TIF2TTOM components from pypi
register all tools in the pcontrol database
startup a TIF2TTOM process chain in pcontrol (=first half of CPP load chain)

slide.p: What's next? A fully running CPP load chain in a VM on your own laptop!

story.title: Prototype feature DNA to enable stable ID's (UUID) - Part II implement algorithm in ProductCreateJob API

tr.td:
Implement DNA for:
City Centers
Maneuvers
Blocked Passages
Direction Of Traffic Flow
Speed Restrictions
Names
Validation Criteria:
UC3 Delta records have reduced noise

ul.li: IDs were already seamed, attributes required still some work
We need stable attribute contents so we can calculate stable IDs (DNA) on top of them
First step of attribute merging: crudely duplicate attributes only present on one of two equal border features
Algo coded to seam attributes
Applied on H&M dataset
No constraint problems, solved all attribute differences.
Integrate in chain, and into existing code
Load through TTOM-GdfLoader
MAD checks

story.title: Locality index - Part 2: model localities in TTOM

div.p: EPIC: Serve Localities as TTOM features

ul.li: LEFT OVER PREVIOUS SPRINT:
Merged bugfix from TIF2MN to TIF2TTOM

Fix potential missing Name Component Key on NAM datasets
Some name_key values are not name components
FULL_NAMENAME_KEY
St VincentSaint Vincent
Xmas LK VlgXmas Lake
Name Model extended with Locality Key atribute

story.title: Package, document and release MNR prototype 8

ul.li: Already available
MNR D64 with traffic signs and overtaking restrictions (more layers)
delta records for two different versions of dataset UC3 (noise reduction)
Problem with Roads on Border - Morton tile issue
NAM: states of California, Arizona, Nevada and Tennessee

ul.p: Feedback received on MNR prototype 7 from MapScape, will be handled next sprint

slide.p: Currently includes only anchor points (XY coords + type) and entry points (XY coords + type + link to road)
Tests on D64 dataset; two layers disabled / enabled:
Timings are unreliable due to Oracle load, Hadoop cluster load. Hard to give correct indication.

ul.li: Currently using dummy country because no country data available in TTOM
Address data not included, planned for future sprint

story.title: Train map line MN & automotive teams on CDP infrastructure

ul.li: Joanna, Pawel, Piotr (Mapline MN), Tomasz, Szymon (HDF), and Kevin

slide.h5: New implementation or integration into existing layers:

ul.li: AdaGradiant, AdaHeight, GscElement, WaterArea2NameSet, AdaCurvature(for NetworkElements), AdaSpeed(for NetworkElements), RoadIdx, WaterLine2NameSet, SignPostInfo, SignPostRouteNumSet, IntersectionIdx, Intersection2NameSet, LandUseCover, LandUseCover2NameSet, FreewayIntersIdx, Railway2NameSet, BoundaryLine, BrunnelPointIndex, BrunnelPoint2NameSet, BrunnelArea2NameSet, CensusDistrict, CensusDistrict2NameSet, AdminPlace, AdminPlace2NameSet
TTOM model (by Tristan), Hadoop, MNR-IO, MNR-Stats, TTOM data creation, Machine Readable Specs, MNR Integeration Testing

slide.h5: Discuss possible DNA approach for HDF product:

ul.li: Share experience of DNA project for MNR
Discuss possible DNA solutions and pitfalls for HDF product
